snippet: There appears to be broad support for gay unions in France, but when it comes to marriage, it may be another matter.
abstract: Legalization of gay marriage in France, which was promised by Pres Francoise Hollande during his campaign for office, has proved tricky and divisive in country, where there appears to be broad support for gay unions but less support for institutionalizing gay marriage and allowing gay couples to adopt.
lead_paragraph: There appears to be broad support for gay unions in France, but when it comes to marriage, it may be another matter.

headline.main: At Once Catholic and Secular, France Debates Gay Marriage
headline.print_headline: At Once Catholic and Secular, France Debates Gay Marriage

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
